author: Kristin Porter
title: Easy Taco Seasoning Recipe
ingredients: 1/3 cup beef or chicken broth, or water
instructions_list: Add the seasonings to a small bowl then stir to combine.
Add the taco seasoning mix and broth or water to 1lb cooked ground meat/beans/tofu then stir to combine and use as desired.
description: My easy homemade Taco Seasoning Recipe is made with spice cupboard staples, and is free from unnecessary additives and thickeners. Seasons 1lb of cooked meat or beans.
